languages.text: Использовать взрывчатку и продув секторов, чтобы гарантированно вышвырнуть проклятое зеркало за борт.

traits.locale_text: Использовать взрывчатку и продув секторов, чтобы гарантированно вышвырнуть проклятое зеркало за борт.

languages.text: Use explosives first, then depressurise the compartment. It's the only way to ensure the cursed mirror is expelled from the ship.
languages.original_text: Использовать взрывчатку и продув секторов, чтобы гарантировано вышвырнуть проклятое зеркало за борт.

traits.locale_text: Use the explosives first, then depressurize the compartment. It's the only way to be sure.
Use the explosives first, then depressurize the compartment. It's the only way to be sure.
Use the explosives first, then depressurize the compartment. It's the only way to be sure.
Use explosives first, then depressurise the compartment. It's the only way to ensure the cursed mirror is expelled from the ship.
Use explosives first, then depressurize the compartment. It's the only way to ensure the cursed mirror is expelled from the ship.
Use explosives first, then depressurise the compartment. It's the only way to ensure the cursed mirror is expelled from the ship.

languages.text: 先使用炸药，之后给船舱减压。只有这样，才能确保彻底将这面被诅咒的镜子丢出去。
languages.original_text: Use explosives first, then depressurise the compartment. It's the only way to ensure the cursed mirror is expelled from the ship.

traits.locale_text: 先使用炸药，之后给船舱减压。只有这样，才能确保彻底将这面被诅咒的镜子丢出去。

languages.text: Usar explosivos y despresurizar el compartimento. Es la única forma de asegurarse de que el espejo maldito abandona la nave.
languages.original_text: Use explosives first, then depressurise the compartment. It's the only way to ensure the cursed mirror is expelled from the ship.

traits.locale_text: Usar explosivos y despresurizar el compartimento. Es la única forma de asegurarse de que el espejo maldito abandona la nave.

languages.text: まず爆薬を使い、次に区画室の中を減圧する。呪いの鏡を確実に船から駆逐するには、それしかない。
languages.original_text: Use explosives first, then depressurise the compartment. It's the only way to ensure the cursed mirror is expelled from the ship.

traits.locale_text: まず爆薬を使い、次に区画室の中を減圧する。呪いの鏡を確実に船から駆逐するには、それしかない。

languages.text: Erst Sprengstoff einsetzen, dann für einen Druckabfall im Modul sorgen. Anders lässt sich nicht sicherstellen, dass der verfluchte Spiegel vom Schiff verbannt ist.
languages.original_text: Use explosives first, then depressurise the compartment. It's the only way to ensure the cursed mirror is expelled from the ship.

traits.locale_text: Erst Sprengstoff einsetzen, dann für einen Druckabfall im Modul sorgen. Anders lässt sich nicht sicherstellen, dass der verfluchte Spiegel vom Schiff verbannt ist.

languages.text: Utiliser d'abord des explosifs, puis dépressuriser le compartiment. C'est le seul moyen de s'assurer que le miroir maudit soit expulsé du vaisseau.
languages.original_text: Use explosives first, then depressurise the compartment. It's the only way to ensure the cursed mirror is expelled from the ship.

traits.locale_text: Utiliser d'abord des explosifs, puis dépressuriser le compartiment. C'est le seul moyen de s'assurer que le miroir maudit soit expulsé du vaisseau.

languages.text: Önce patlayıcı kullan, sonra da kompartımanın basıncını düşür. Lanetli aynanın gemiden atılmasını sağlamanın tek yolu bu.
languages.original_text: Use explosives first, then depressurise the compartment. It's the only way to ensure the cursed mirror is expelled from the ship.
